\begin{kframe}
\noindent{\color{srccolor}XLget}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}function (range, XLrange = \{}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    if (missing(range)) }
\noindent{\color{outcolor}        XL\$selection()}
